personalInfo.residence: Scottsdale, AZ; plays out of Grayhawk GC
personalInfo.family: Wife, Elayna; Tatum Elayne (6/29/95), Jake Rhodes (8/11/97)

tourBios.otherInfo: First qualified for the PGA TOUR with victory at 1989 Chattanooga Classic. Won 1993 Cleveland Open en route to finishing third on Nationwide Tour money list. Finished 12th on 1995 Nationwide Tour money list after winning Louisiana Open and Miami Valley Open. Carded rounds of 62 in each of those victories...Needed just six putts over his first nine holes at the Northview G&CC during the second round of the 2002 Air Canada Championship...Three-time All-Big Eight selection and twice All-American at Missouri. Won 1986 Kansas Open, 1988 and 1989 Missouri Opens, 1980 Missouri Junior Championship. His annual "Go For The Gold" skins game in Columbia, Mo., has been benefiting Rainbow House, a safe house for children, since 1991. Has own golf consulting business called Stan Utley's Tour-Tested Golf (stanutleygolf.com) where he teaches both professionals and amateurs.

tourBios.carHigh: 2015: Earned the ninth position at the 2015 PGA TOUR Champions National Qualifying Tournament, and conditionally exempt status, when he defeated Steve Jones with a par on the first playoff hole after both had tied at 12-under-par 272...Lone appearance during the year came at the Encompass Championship with a T31 at North Shore CC. 2013: Qualified for the U.S. Senior Open and was T56. 2012: Made his Champions Tour debut at the Toshiba Classic. After earning a spot in the field as a Monday qualifier, proceeded to T12 after successive rounds of 69 on the weekend in Newport Beach.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: First qualified for the PGA TOUR with a victory at 1989 Chattanooga Classic. Won 1993 Cleveland Open en route to finishing third on Web.com Tour money list. Finished 12th on 1995 Web.com Tour money list after winning Louisiana Open and Miami Valley Open. Carded rounds of 62 in each of those victories...Needed just six putts over his first nine holes at the Northview G&CC during the second round of the 2002 Air Canada Championship...Three-time All-Big Eight selection and twice All-American at Missouri. Won 1986 Kansas Open, 1988 and 1989 Missouri Opens, 1980 Missouri Junior Championship.
tourBios.personal: His annual "Go For The Gold" skins game in Columbia, Mo., has been benefiting Rainbow House, a safe house for children, since 1991. Has own golf consulting business called Stan Utley's Tour-Tested Golf (stanutleygolf.com) where he teaches both professionals and amateurs.
tourBios.priorYearSeason: Lone appearance came in the 3M Championship where he T43 at TPC Twin Cities.

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA TOUR Champions was T12th in 2012 at the Toshiba Classic.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T88th in YTD Consecutive Cuts on the PGA TOUR Champions.
